result.title: Enhanced communications kit for RIA projects and CIVINETs
result.description: This deliverable provides new communication material that will be created for CIVITAS ELEVATE These include a promotional booklet and poster template to introduce the RIA projects In addition a new CIVINET flyer will be prepared alongside a CIVINET Event Kit consisting of a popup stand two rollups and two portable shelves This deliverable relates to Task 53

result.title: Supporting tools with the exception of the SPREM module
result.description: Analysis of the tools necessary for SPREMMapping of available supporting tools oAvailable tools in Belgium and in particular in the SURE2050 consortium oAvailable tools in other countriesDevelopment of web based SPREM library for Public Clients oSelection of a web platform to use as a library eg SharepointoLibrary structureoSelection of documents and uploading Development of toolsoGuideline on SPREMoGuideline on the SPREM implementation roadmapoGuideline on SPREM data and performance indicatorsoGuideline on Sustainable Public Procurement including Energy Performance Contracting oTemplate of a SPREM Strategic PlanoSpreadsheet for Real Estate InformationoSURE2050 platform Review of the toolsoDevelopment of a review checklist that will be used during the coaching oDevelopment of a questionnaire for Public Clients oAnalysis of what can be improved based on feedback of Public Clients and internal evaluationoAdaptation of tools
